subject: Issue after firmware update – Pro X Pedals
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Support Team,
I have just installed the latest firmware requested for the Pro X pedals. The update completed successfully, but right after that the pedals are no longer detected by the system.
To help you better understand the situation, I have attached a video showing the issue.
I kindly ask for your assistance in resolving this problem as soon as possible.
Looking forward to your reply.
Best regards,
Vito

conversations.body_text: Hi Vito Rebaudo,    Please make sure your SIMSONN Manager is updated to version 2.1.0. Then follow the steps below:    Open the software and go to Settings → Update, then click Check for Updates.    Check if the ProX firmware can be updated to version 2.0.3.    If no automatic update is available, please use Manual Update: Path: Settings → Update → Manual Update Firmware → pedals → firmware → pedals-prox.sfu.    After the update, please test again.    If the issue persists, try reconnecting the USB and power cable, then test again.    If it still doesn’t work, please send me a screenshot of the software interface so I can check further for you
